title: How to Make Tamarillo Topping

steps.headline: Put the peeled tamarillos into a blender or food processor.
Blend or process the ingredients until smooth.
Use as required.
steps.description: This recipe makes about 3 cups of sauce. If there is any left over, freeze in small cubes for later use.

text: Put the peeled tamarillos into a blender or food processor.  Add the sugar.  Blend or process the ingredients until smooth.  Use as required. This recipe makes about 3 cups of sauce. If there is any left over, freeze in small cubes for later use.
